name: Welcome to our survey!
body:
Dear participant,

**Thank you for participating in our research project!**

We are investigating the attractiveness of Bitcoin (a digital currency) for remittances (international money transfers) and would like to ask you some questions regarding the subject.

The completion of this questionnaire should take about 15 minutes.

All your responses will be assessed anonymously.

If you have any questions, please contact us at [bitcoin.remittance@gmail.com](mailto:bitcoin.remittance@gmail.com).
 
Robert Hundeshagen & Sven Hoffmann

Technische Universität München

Chair of Strategy and Organization

Prof. Dr. Isabell M. Welpe
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
